General.Name: Tiangong International Company Limited
General.Description: Tiangong International Company Limited engages in the production and sale of tool steel die steel, high speed steel, cutting tools, tiangong mould steel, and titanium alloys. The company products are used in aviation, automotive, high-speed trains, petroleum chemical, and machinery processing industries. It operates in the People's Republic of China, Europe, other Asian countries, and internationally. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Danyang, China.

8.Name: Mr. Rongjun  Jiang
8.Title: GM & Exec. Director of Jiangsu Tiangong Technology
